name: Hito Hito no Mi

abilities.name: Seven Transformations (via Rumble Ball)
abilities.description: When enhanced by the Rumble Ball, allows access to seven different transformation forms instead of the standard three Zoan forms

abilities.name: Jump Point
abilities.description: Agility and speed-focused transformation with enhanced legs for rapid movement and evasion

abilities.name: Guard Point
abilities.description: Defensive transformation that creates a fur-covered ball shape capable of blocking powerful attacks

abilities.name: Arm Point
abilities.description: Strength-focused transformation with muscular upper body for powerful melee attacks

abilities.name: Brain Point (Enhanced)
abilities.description: Intelligence-enhanced form used for strategic analysis and identifying weaknesses

strengths: Multiple transformation forms provide versatility in combat
Can be enhanced with Rumble Ball for additional transformations
Combines human intelligence with animal physical abilities
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Rumble Ball has time limit (3 minutes) and cooldown period (6 hours)
Multiple Rumble Balls within 6 hours cause dangerous side effects
notes: Episode 88 marks the first combat demonstration of the Rumble Ball enhancement, revealing the full versatility of Chopper's Devil Fruit when augmented by his pharmaceutical invention.

name: Baku Baku no Mi

abilities.name: People Fusion
abilities.description: Ability to devour people and combine them inside the body, creating fusion warriors with combined abilities

strengths: Can eat and transform body parts into anything consumed
Can combine people into stronger hybrid warriors
Enhanced jaw strength and digestive system
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Consumed items only usable for 24 hours
notes: Episode 88 reveals the people-fusion application of the Baku Baku no Mi, as Wapol combines Chess and Kuromarimo into Chessmarimo.
